scripts.browserify-prod: browserify src/main/webapp/babel-out/index.js -g [envify --NODE_ENV production] -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > src/main/webapp/bundle.js
scripts.build-dev: npm run babel && npm run browserify
scripts.build-prod: npm run babel && npm run browserify-prod
